Text: Love this music. Finally there is a band that can take over where Led Zeppelin left us with bleeding hearts in a silant empty space.

Check out The Answer from Belfast, hammarberget. If you like the Rival Sons, you'll love these guys: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6811012/The_Answer_-_Revival_(Limited_Edition)_(2011)_[FLAC]

I have tickets to see them live on Thursday (March 15) here in London.
Can you upload the album in mp3 please? pref 320k. Thank you in advance!
Any chance of an mp3 version please?
